text: Jean-Alfred Villain-Marais (11 December 1913 â€“ 8 November 1998), known as Jean Marais (), was a French actor and director. Marais had over 100 roles in film and on television. He was also known for writing, painting and sculpture. In the 1950s, Marais became a star of swashbuckling films. He performed his own stunts. After 1970 he mostly worked in plays. ==Other websites== * * Category:1913 births Category:1998 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiovascular disease Category:French LGBT people Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:LGBT actors
title: Jean Marais
